title: Hour 1: Deshaun Watson Suspended
description:
In this episode, Ryan Clark, Channing Crowder, and Fred Taylor react to breaking news as Deshaun Watson is handed a 6-game suspension after violating the league's personal conduct policy. Also joining the show with more reaction and information are Adam Schefter, Louis Riddick, Mary Kay Cabot, and Stephen A. The crew remembers 11-time NBA champion and Hall of Famer Bill Russell in the wake of his passing.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN, Stephen A. Smith, Molly Qerim Rose
itunes:subtitle: First Take Hour 1: Reacting to the suspension of Browns QB Deshaun Watson
